description:
The number one ranked third year student at West Genetics who has a bubbly personality that serves her well in her role as the Student Council President.
While she usually acts cowardly, but when she gets serious, many students begin to fear and respect her including the other third years students.
She possesses four stigmas and has a special ability called "Illusion Turn".
Her Volt weapon is a clawed gauntlet.
name: Chiffon Fairchild
